analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol:
	Contract CrestToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#101-102)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of CrestToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of CrestToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CrestToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#208-209) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of CrestToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#209-210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CrestToken.burn (/unique_chucks/20/0x699a27f71bf580b94b4aeec09b54e264b67f5cce.sol#222) is not in mixedCase
